title: Rainy city driving, moderate speed, no significant braking
caption: A red car drives down a rainy city street, passing a blue car and a parked truck.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.2 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and visibility is slightly reduced. There are several other cars on the road, including a blue car to the left of the ego vehicle. A parked truck is also visible on the right side of the road. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and they are currently red.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed to maintain control on the wet road. It passes a blue car and a parked truck, and it slows down as it approaches the red traffic lights. The driver is cautious and attentive, adjusting the speed and direction according to the traffic and weather conditions.
